import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var initialState={data:{'Top and front side':[{name:'Length',check:false},{name:'Direction',check:false},{name:'Curl Level',check:false}],'Side':[{name:'Length',check:false},{name:'Curl Level',check:false}],'Braid':[{name:'Yes/No Braid',check:false},{name:'Count',check:false},{name:'Position',check:false},{name:'Braid Style',check:false}]}};export var categorySlice=createSlice({name:'category',initialState:initialState,reducers:{isChecked:function isChecked(state,action){var dataArray=state.data[action.payload.groupName];dataArray.forEach(function(element){if(element.name===action.payload.selection){element.check=true;}});}}});// Action creators are generated for each case reducer function
var isChecked=categorySlice.actions.isChecked;export{isChecked};export default categorySlice.reducer;
